root.description: Thorns prick you skin as you push through the deep woods.

exit.description: A [stream] babble quietly a short way off.
exit.detailedDescription: The [stream] has an easy current. It's shallow, but cold.

character.description:
Jack is caught in the thorns. "Ouch! I can't make it any further. Here, (take) my [torch]. You can (use) it to light up dark places.
To (take) the [torch], type "take torch" and hit ENTER.
character.detailedDescription: Jack is too weak to make is through the thorns.
character.onTalk: Jack: "I'm going back home. I'll leave it to you to find Joss."

item.description: Jack hold an unlit [torch] in his outstretched arm.
item.detailedDescription: This can light up dark places.
